title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Targets in Southern Lebanon: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military buildings harboring terrorists and terror infrastructure; The IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in southern Lebanon

Earlier today, fighter jets struck two military buildings housing terrorists in the Aita al-Shaab region, and the terror infrastructure of the Hezbollah terror organization in the An-Naqoura and Majdal Zun areas.

Earlier today, two firings from Lebanese territory were identified crossing towards the Rosh HaNikra area, the IDF attacked the sources of the fire. In response to the firings, fighter jets attacked a terror infrastructure in the Al-Ketran area.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: :https://bit.ly/49HxwSp
